page.title: 10A WEEKDAY FOR JULIA
page.content: I'm Julia, aged 9. I get up at 7.30 and have cornflakes and orange juice. I catch the school bus at 8.20. Today, after prayers at 9.00 we had a lady teacher for science. After play and tuckshop we returned to the hut to write up our experiment. At noon there is dinner in the main school. Then some of the oldest children have music lessons. Afternoon school (1.30-3.30) ends with a story. I'm on the bus for half an hour. Changed into play clothes, I enjoy crisps, especially pickled onion flavour. We have tea and watch T.V., then at 6.00 I get in and shut the cows into their yard. I visit the neighbours to ride their Shetland pony. From 7.30 till 8.30 I watch T.V. and then it's bedtime. Julia Gillbard
